title: A Breach of Silence - The Darkest Road  mp3  (2014)
description:
Australia's A Breach Of Silence have revealed the cover art and tracklisting for their upcoming sophomore album, The Darkest Road, out October 7th on Eclipse Records. The cover art was designed by Gabriel Serbanescu, who also designed art for the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s 2013 debut album, Dead Or Alive.
For this, their sophomore album, A Breach Of Silence brought back legendary Swedish producers Fredrik Nordstrom and Henrik Udd (Bring Me the Horizon, Arch Enemy, In Flames) flying them Ã¢â‚¬Å“down underÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ to record at Acolyte Studios in Brisbane, Australia. The masters were later mixed at the infamous Studio Fredman in Sweden. A Breach Of Silence are known for their unique mix of modern metalcore and power-metal vocal breakdowns which many of their fans refer to as Ã¢â‚¬ËœpowercoreÃ¢â‚¬â„¢. Clocking in at over 56 minutes, The Darkest Road delivers fourteen tracks of technical, impressive songwriting that will forever be remembered as the bandÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s defining moment in music history.







A Breach Of Silence was thrown into the spotlight when they won AustraliaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s prestigious Q Music Award (2012) in the Best Heavy Song category. Shortly thereafter, the band inked a worldwide, multi-album deal with Eclipse Records, released thier debut album Dead Or Alive (October, 2013) and have toured with bands such as Born Of Osiris, Adept, The Amity Affliction, and Upon A Burning Body. In March of 2014, the band released their controversial Night Rider Ã¢â‚¬Ëœfirst-person shooterÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ music video which was inspired by their obsession with FPS video games and 1960Ã¢â‚¬â„¢s classic westerns such as Hang Ã¢â‚¬Ëœem High and The Good, The Bad, And The Ugly.
